entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
